entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:47 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -24.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
